thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: Fidelity investments says homepage is down, working to fix problem

title: Fidelity investments says homepage is down, working to fix problem
text:
February 6, 2018 / 3:04 PM / in 18 minutes Fidelity investments says homepage is down, working to fix problem Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
BOSTON, Feb 6 (Reuters) - Fidelity Investments said on Tuesday that its homepage was down and that it was working to fix the problem. 
“Our homepage is temporarily unavailable but don’t worry, we’re working quickly to fix this problem,” the Boston-based mutual fund company said on its website. “You can still access Fidelity.com and log in to your accounts. Thank you for your patience.” Reporting By Tim McLaughlin; editing by Scott Malone
